title: Advanced Purchase Rate
seo_title: Advanced Purchase Rate | Deals at The Frederick Hotel
excerpt: One of our best rates available, get up to 20% off when you book our Advanced Purchase Rate 14 days in advance at our Tribeca boutique hotel
description: One of our best rates available, get up to 20% off when you book our Advanced Purchase Rate 14 days in advance at our Tribeca boutique hotel. Mingle at our speakeasy-style bar and sleep easy in our stylish accommodations knowing you got the hook-up at The Frederick.
terms_list:
• A three-night minimum stay is required.
  • The reservation must be paid in full at the time of booking.
